title: Rework Taric consistently wins against Thresh

replies.body:
Taric has his drawbacks. He eats poke easily and Thresh also has the insta-escape. If the carry is near the lantern, there is basically nothing you can do to stop it. Also, Lantern ganks.

Edit: I should add that Taric is a tank. Thresh isn't.

As a Thresh Main I think it is a skill based match-up. If thresh can land a hook on a carry and they focus that carry before 6 then thresh can win the match-up. After 6 by far I think the scale tilts towards taric. Thresh has to be pretty close to pull off his cc and taric's ult cancels it. If thresh lands a great hook they have to kill the carry within the 1-2 seconds. Taric ult is also much shorter than the box by at least 30 seconds. 

So as a recap: Early it is more of if thresh can land a hook or taric a good stun
Mid: Taric wins due to his ult
late: Pretty even because at this point the amount of time before invulnerability won't really matter.

Breakdown makes sense to me, but I always figure Taric as being a much more proficient team fighter than Thresh.  If your team can capitalize on picks, Thresh is king.  But if you're actually getting into a full 5v5, I take Taric over just about anyone.  It's surviving up to that point that is a bit more difficult.
I consistently beat Thresh as Taric as well. I also tend to do really well against Thresh with Kench too.

well i think you are right

taric is tanky with a shield and a heal and gets bonus damage in melee range 

the stun is a skillshot, normally, but when thresh hooks your adc it no longer is a skillshot if he goes in its guaranteed stun allowing you to win the trade

so his best option is to hook you, and if he goes in you can outtank him and gain bonus damage since he is in your face and you can now weave spells with aa's

there isnt a good hook option for him so allins will become difficult and post 6 near impossible 

You also have good sustain and the shield to deal with his ranged poke if that's all he does

if you dont misuse your abilities its a difficult situation for thresh
